channel.title: Comments on: Scrapyard Challenge Jr.: A low-cost, reduced feature-set platform utilizing open hardware for experimenting with electricity and materials through creating sound

item.title: By: Open Hardware Summit 2012 | Critical DIY and Participatory Learning at the New School
item.dc:creator: Open Hardware Summit 2012 | Critical DIY and Participatory Learning at the New School
item.description: [...] Moriwaki, Jonah Brucker-Cohen, Louisa Campbell, Joe Saavedra, and Liza Stark presented “Scrapyard Challenge Jr.: A low-cost, reduced feature-set platform utilizing open hardware for experi....” The project was accepted as a Talk, Demo, and Poster. This entry was posted in events by [...]
